```{r}
col <- c("Country", "Continent")
globalPop <- read_xls("C:/calvintansh/ISSS608-VAA/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex03-2/data/GlobalPopulation.xls",
                      sheet = "Data") %>%
  mutate(across(col, as.factor)) %>% # mutate(across())
```

``` {r}
bp <- globalPop %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~Old,
          y = ~Young,
          size = ~Population,
          color = ~Continent,
          sizes = c(10,600),
          frame = ~Year,
          text = ~Country,
          hoverinfo = "text",
          type = 'scatter',
          mode = 'markers'
          )
bp
```
